feed.title: How to: Wear Coloured Jeans
feed.subtitle: Coloured jeans are a hot trend, but how do you pull off this look without looking like a giant walking Crayola? Here are three easy steps to help you make it work.

link.Abstract: Coloured jeans are a hot trend, but how do you pull off this look without looking like a giant walking Crayola? Here are three easy steps to help you make it work.

link.Abstract: From left to right: 1: Rag & Bone's The Legging Jeans in Neon yellow. Available at Shopbop.com, $199.57 CDN/2: Blank Denim's Ankle Skinny Jeans in Turquoise. Available at Shopbop.com, $72.57 CDN/3: Mother's The Runaway Skinny Flare Jeans in Poppy. Available at ShopBop.com, $138.20 CDN/4: 7 For All Mankind's Gwenevere Super Skinny in Deep Cantaloupe. Available at 7forallmankind.com, $169.00 US.

entry.title: Celebrity Beauty Secrets

link.Abstract: We've got the inside scoop on how to get the stars' favourite looks. Find out how they get picture-perfect for the cameras.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Want to get picture perfect bronzed cheeks? Jennifer Lopez's makeup artist, Scott Barnes, told InStyle magazine to be careful where you apply the dust. He said, "No powder around laugh lines, nose, or eyes; it adds darkness and ages you."
link.title: Jennifer Lopez - Celebrity Beauty Secrets
